ModMetaData.name: More Aptitude Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 5*12 Aptitude genes. Or 60 genes if you want the more boring version. I digress, probably. This adds 5 categories of genes for every aptitude.
Inept, -20 in the aptitude and removes all Passion, rendering it nigh-unusable Abysmal, -14 in the aptitude and removes all passion Decent, +8 in that aptitude Phenomenal, +12 in the aptitude and a +1 in passion Instinctive, +20 to the aptitude, but renders them incapable of feeling passion about it.
Included in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2985153870]More Biotech Style Genes - All in One[/url]
